mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Scraping mode: resolve a company entity, search filings, or get XBRL facts.

query.title: Search query (name or text)
query.description: Company name/ticker for resolve_entity, or free text for filing search.

ticker.title: Ticker
ticker.description: Stock ticker to resolve to CIK.

formTypes.title: Form types
formTypes.description: List of form types to include (e.g., 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K).

dateFrom.title: Filed from (YYYY-MM-DD)
dateFrom.description: Filter filings filed on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

dateTo.title: Filed to (YYYY-MM-DD)
dateTo.description: Filter filings filed on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

maxResults.title: Max results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return. Free users are limited to 25 per run.

maxRecentFilings.title: Max recent filings (resolve_entity)
maxRecentFilings.description: Number of recent filings to include in resolve_entity output (1-100).

namespaces.title: XBRL namespaces (facts)
namespaces.description: Filter company facts by namespaces (e.g., us-gaap).

concepts.title: XBRL concepts
concepts.description: Filter company facts by concept names.

periodType.title: Period type
periodType.description: Filter facts by period type (instant or duration).

userAgent.title: Custom User-Agent (SEC required)
userAgent.description: SEC requires a User-Agent header. Format: 'Your Name YourEmail@example.com'.

includeAmendments.title: Include amended forms (*/A)
includeAmendments.description: Whether to include amended filings (forms ending in /A).

formPrefix.title: Form prefix filter
formPrefix.description: Optional prefix to filter forms (e.g., '10-' matches 10-K, 10-Q).

requestIntervalSecs.title: Request interval (seconds)
requestIntervalSecs.description: Minimum interval between HTTP requests to SEC (default 0.3s).

maxRetries.title: Max retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries on failed requests.
